pages.text:
Celebrate with us!
Thank you for considering Cypress and Grove Brewing Company for your event!
Before completing the form below, please note the following:
Our Event Room can seat no more than 100 people.  We can seat 100 chairs in lecture style, 80 chairs at tables (each table seats 8), or 100 with a combination of tables and chairs, high tops, and additional chairs along the back and side, as well as our bench seating.
We offer tables, chairs, linens, and AV equipment (speaker, microphone, projector, screen).  Bands and DJs must provide their sound equipment.
Our garden space can be made private for your event. Please note if you need this space.
Decorations may not be taped, pinned, or nailed to walls.  Open-flamed candles are not allowed.
Rental time includes the set-up and break-down time needed for your event.
Outside food/catering and decorations are limited to the Event Room.  Catering and decorations are not allowed in the Brick Room.
Outside alcohol is prohibited.
Event Fees: Sun-Th: $150/hr and F-Sat: $300/hr; extra fees apply for early opening or late closure; non-profit discounts may apply with appropriate documentation
Our hours are M-Sat 2-10, Sunday 2-8.
Please call the Brewery for inquiries about hosting events open to the public. Fees will be determined based on your unique needs.
